mapper.select: SELECT PLUS19_YN FROM TB_DP_PROD WHERE PROD_ID = #{value} AND SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000207'
SELECT CMPX_PROD_GRP_CD FROM TB_DP_CMPX_PROD WHERE PROD_ID = #{productId}

SELECT /* VoucherMapper.selectVoucherMapProduct, 이용권 매핑상품 조회, SAC전시 이태균/I-S PLUS, 2015-05-11 */ * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , IV.* FROM ( SELECT COUNT(PD.PROD_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , FM.PROD_ID , FM.PART_PROD_ID , FM.CONTENTS_CLSF_CD , FM.DWLD_DRM_YN , FM.EXPO_ORD ,(CASE WHEN FM.ICON_CLSF_CD='DP006701' THEN 'new' WHEN FM.ICON_CLSF_CD='DP006702' THEN 'closing' END) AS ICON_CLSF_CD , FM.SETT_RATE , FM.STD_PRICE , FM.STRM_DRM_YN , PD.TOP_MENU_ID , NVL(PD.PLUS19_YN, 'N') AS PLUS19_YN FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG FM , TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG MP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY CT WHERE FM.PROD_ID = #{productId} AND FM.PART_PROD_ID = PD.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PD.PROD_Id = MP.PROD_ID AND MP.MENU_ID = CT.MENU_ID AND MP.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND CT.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND PD.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP RS, TB_DP_PROD EP, TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD ET WHERE RS.PROD_ID=PD.PROD_ID AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_CM_DEVICE DV WHERE DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND DV.USE_YN = 'Y' AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID in ('DP17' , 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN DV.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN = 'N' THEN (CASE WHEN EP.DRM_YN ='N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ELSE 'Y' END ELSE 'Y' END AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID in ('DP17' , 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN DV.HDV_SPRT_YN = 'N' THEN (CASE WHEN SC.DP_PG_QULT_CD in ('PD009701' , 'PD009702') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ELSE 'Y' END ELSE 'Y' END AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID in ('DP17' , 'DP18') THEN DV.VOD_FIXISTT_SPRT_YN WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP13' THEN DV.EBOOK_SPRT_YN WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP14' THEN DV.COMIC_SPRT_YN ELSE 'Y' END ) AND RS.PART_PROD_ID = EP.PROD_ID AND EP.PROD_ID = SC.PROD_ID AND EP.PROD_ID = ET.PROD_ID AND ET.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND ET.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' ) ORDER BY FM.EXPO_ORD, PD.LAST_DEPLOY_DT DESC ) IV ) OV WHERE OV.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND (#{offset}+#{count}-1) ORDER BY OV.RNUM
